pages.text:
ABOUT MARKEE
Teresa Sanders
Owner/Operator Markee Music
WE ARE HERE TO HELP FACILITATE YOUR DREAMS!
Our vision for Markee is to provide a world-class facility that offers the absolute best service, top-notch gear, and an unparalleled atmosphere for musicians and bands seeking rehearsal and recording space like never before.
We offer six fully equipped, state-of-the-art rehearsal studios. Our space is ideal for any musician, from beginners to professionals. Whether you need to rehearse with your band or simply require a writers' room, we have you covered. Each room is 18’ x 18’ and includes two guitar amps, a bass rig, a keyboard amp, a five-piece drum kit on a riser, a 12-channel mixer with two flying speakers and two floor monitors, and four mics with stands and cables.
We also have a performance room, The Markee Room, that is 32’ x 26’ and comes complete with two guitar amps, a bass rig, a keyboard amp, a DW Classic drum kit with cymbals and a kick pedal, a 20-channel Peavey board, three powered floor monitors, two side fills, and two flying speakers.
Here at Markee, we have an amazing support crew who will always greet you with a smile and provide the best service possible to ensure you have a great experience. Markee’s technical personnel are always available to assist you with anything you need during your stay.
​
Since opening in 2010, Markee has become the premier rehearsal, recording, and lesson facility in South Florida! With rave reviews from our customers, Markee draws over 15,000 musicians annually through its doors, and we believe this is just the beginning.
We look forward to seeing each and every one of you here at Markee.
Now, let's make some music!

OUR AUDIO ENGINEERS
MARKO RUFFOLO
Senior Engineer/Producer
Marko Ruffolo is a South Florida Independent Record Producer & Engineer with over 40 Years of experience.
He is best known for his work in Rock, Smooth-Jazz,
Jazz, & Metal as well as Era-Specific Tribute Bands.
Past Projects/Artists include: Merle Haggard,
The Rippingtons, Stanley Clarke, Larry Coryell,
Jesse Jones Jr., Jen Majura, Nicko McBrain (Iron Maiden),
and the debut Smith/Kotzen Album Single: "Solar Fire", reaching the Billboard Top 10.
Locally, Marko is currently producing Vember,
Blistering Tree, Mount SInai, caro, The Sound Lizards,
Stone Castle Band, & many, many more!
Tribute Bands Marko works with: In The Light of Led Zeppelin, Studio 54, Roulette, HardWired, Replay, All-American Tribute Band, Zanadu, The Boss Project,
and Roll The Stones.
